Saukhya - Pro A healthcare management system enables fast, accurate and automated collection of patient data and subsequent report generation, and is ideal for small general hospitals.
	 

 	


Saukhya - Pro is a user-friendly, Hospital Information System that automates the entire spectrum of general hospital activities such as the patient history, physical examination, progress notes, prescriptions, lab tests and results.
